root.name: Fast & Furious: SuperCars
root.description: OverviewFast Furious: SuperCars is a racing game developed and manufactured by Raw Thrills for the arcade platform.SuperCars arcade cabinets can have up to eight machine linked up together for multiplayer games. SuperCars also allows players to save their progress and achievements by using a PIN system similar to that in games like NFL Blitz or NBA Jam.
